tags: i want her to keep having fun but not at the expense of everyone elses'
summary: My fellow dms and  players I need help. I'm currently dming a group of new players and while most of them are doing great I'm...
body: My fellow dms and players I need help. I’m currently dming a group of new players and while most of them are doing great I’m having real trouble with one of them. Shes trying to play a flirtatious and charismatic bard but she is the least charismatic person ever. She tries to persuade npcs but says something super awkward and not persuasive but then rolls like a 24 on her persuasion check. She tried to cast hideous laughter so I got her to actually tell a joke for fun and the joke she told didnt make sense at all but the bandit failed his wisdom save so had to laugh anyway. Other players of mine find her very awkward and hard to play with so I was wondering if anyone had any tips so that I could help her out and make this game more fun

summary: Matt: So, Caduceus, you're first on initiative order. You fall and you see a fire elemental, a shatter in the stone where...
body:
Matt: So, Caduceus, you're first on initiative order. You fall and you see a fire elemental, a shatter in the stone where electricity is fading and Beau looks like she just saw a ghost... And maybe shit herself.
Beau: Hey, speak for yourself!

dialogue.name: Matt
dialogue.label: Matt:
dialogue.phrase: So, Caduceus, you're first on initiative order. You fall and you see a fire elemental, a shatter in the stone where electricity is fading and Beau looks like she just saw a ghost... And maybe shit herself.

summary: Witch Hunt - Chapter 4 - HellHathNoFury - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
title: Witch Hunt - Chapter 4 - HellHathNoFury - Critical Role (Web Series) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Allura groaned. Her head was pounding something fierce, and her whole body felt like it had been crushed by several boulders.

At least you still have a body . Allura frowned, not sure why she would think that.

She tried to open her eyes, but her body didn’t seem to respond to her brain, and they remained closed. Gods, her head. How could something hurt so much? Had Arnulf finally managed to convince her to try his homebrewed potato liquor, was that why she felt like she had been pulled through the wringer?

She tried to recall Arnulf’s always smiling face as he would offer her his drink. She couldn’t picture it, the heavy, painful fog in her mind distorting his features into an angry sneer. Strange.

She tried to recall Arnulf’s always smiling face as he would offer her his drink. She couldn’t picture it, the heavy, painful fog in her mind distorting his features into an angry sneer. Strange.

She tried to open her eyes, but her body didn’t seem to respond to her brain, and they remained closed. Gods, her head. How could something hurt so much? Had Arnulf finally managed to convince her to try his homebrewed potato liquor, was that why she felt like she had been pulled through the wringer?

She tried to recall Arnulf’s always smiling face as he would offer her his drink. She couldn’t picture it, the heavy, painful fog in her mind distorting his features into an angry sneer. Strange.

She tried to open her eyes, but her body didn’t seem to respond to her brain, and they remained closed. Gods, her head. How could something hurt so much? Had Arnulf finally managed to convince her to try his homebrewed potato liquor, was that why she felt like she had been pulled through the wringer?

summary: You know how sometimes it’s easier to tell people how you feel when they’re disconnected from the situation? Imagine Caleb just...
body:
You know how sometimes it’s easier to tell people how you feel when they’re disconnected from the situation? Imagine Caleb just fucking telling someone how he feels and the members of the Mighty Nein are like ???? Bitch I’m right here???? Literally right here? Who tf is this punk and why do you trust them more than me?

I need to read this or write this…

summary: Have I ever made something this involved with digital art before? No. Did I have a lot of fun? Absolutely! C2Ep45 was WILD. I...
caption: Have I ever made something this involved with digital art before? No. Did I have a lot of fun? Absolutely! C2Ep45 was WILD. I have never been so scared for Jester in my entire life, so of course I had to draw her! I can’t wait to see what comes next after the chaos that was this episode…

reblog.comment: Have I ever made something this involved with digital art before? No. Did I have a lot of fun? Absolutely! C2Ep45 was WILD. I have never been so scared for Jester in my entire life, so of course I had to draw her! I can’t wait to see what comes next after the chaos that was this episode…

trail.content_raw: Have I ever made something this involved with digital art before? No. Did I have a lot of fun? Absolutely! C2Ep45 was WILD. I have never been so scared for Jester in my entire life, so of course I had to draw her! I can’t wait to see what comes next after the chaos that was this episode…
trail.content: Have I ever made something this involved with digital art before? No. Did I have a lot of fun? Absolutely! C2Ep45 was WILD. I have never been so scared for Jester in my entire life, so of course I had to draw her! I can’t wait to see what comes next after the chaos that was this episode…
